summary: This document is an FBI email chain from August 2019 discussing operational planning for a search warrant execution on Jeffrey Epstein's private island, Little St. James, in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It details travel logistics, coordination with other agencies, and the status of the investigation, including that most co-conspirators had been served and digital evidence was being processed.

persons.name: RDT
persons.context: An FBI individual being sent to the Virgin Islands to arrange lodging, transportation, and coordination for the search operation.

persons.name: Lenny
persons.context: Cc'd on an earlier SCN (Sensitive Compartmented Information) distribution email regarding Epstein.

events.title: FBI team travel to Virgin Islands
events.description: Planned for the main FBI team to fly to St. Thomas on an FBI Q400 plane to prepare for the search warrant execution.

events.title: Planned search warrant execution on Little St. James
events.description: Scheduled execution of a search warrant at 6am on Jeffrey Epstein's private island, Little St. James, anticipated to take 1-3 days.

events.title: Case agents travel to swear out warrant
events.description: FBI case agents planned to travel to St. Thomas to swear out the search warrant and conduct key interviews of employees.

events.title: SCN update regarding island search
events.description: An SCN (Sensitive Compartmented Information) document was updated with information regarding the planned search of Epstein's island.

locations: Little St. James (Epstein's island, U.S. Virgin Islands)
keyFacts: As of August 7, 2019, all but one co-conspirator in the Epstein case had been served; the remaining one was a British citizen currently unavailable.

The FBI was actively planning a large-scale search operation on Epstein's 70+ acre private island, Little St. James, involving approximately 40 personnel and coordination with CBP and the Coast Guard.
Digital media seized from Epstein's residence was being processed by CART and was nearly ready for review, while victim and witness interviews were ongoing.
The SDNY was working with lawyers regarding co-conspirator cooperation, indicating ongoing plea or cooperation negotiations.

The email chain shows high-level FBI coordination (including CACHTU - Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking Unit) and the use of sensitive compartmented information (SCN) for operational planning.
